# Installation

The package is available from GitHub *cub* repository. To install it you will require `devtools` library to be installed. 

```{r eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github('MoBaBioinf/cub', dependencies = TRUE, build_vignettes = TRUE)
```

# Input data

All the functions in this package are designed to work with `Biostrings::DNAString` and `Biostrings::DNAStringSet` data types.

# Basic workflow

## Extract codons from CDSs

The package is shipped with the CDSs from *P. aeruginosa*  *PAO1* and *PA14* strains:

```{r message = FALSE}
library(cub)

dna01 <- PAO1CDS
dna02 <- PA14CDS

show(dna01)
```
